name: washingRinseCycle_increase
description: This function is used to increase the number of rinse cycles on a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase the rinse cycles.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to increase the rinse cycles.

parameters.name: rinseCycleDelta
parameters.description: The delta value to increase the rinse cycles.
